revised_title: Elastic Stability of Twisted Strips under Tension
tldr: This article investigates the elastic stability of thin twisted strips when subjected to tension along their length. The author presents a more accurate solution to the stability equations and compares the results with experimental findings, showing good agreement between them. The theoretical discussion and numerical work focus on a steel strip, with the main findings indicating that the strip becomes unstable at a specific twist value, forming a series of loops on the twisted strip.
